name: Chilly Garlic Noodles
description: Jullienes of vegetables tossed with flour noodles in light soy sauce and chilli paste topped with burnt garlic.

name: Veg Pad Thai Noodles
description: A Thai streetside classic! Flat rice noodles tossed with bean sprout and garlic chives in a tangy tamarind and date palm sauce garnished with crushed peanuts.

name: Singapore Style Noodles
description: Jullienes of vegetables tossed with flour noodles in our in house sweet and tangy sauce garnished with spring onion.

name: Chicken Chilli Garlic Noodles
description: Jullienes of chicken tossed with flour noodles in light soy sauce and chilli paste topped with burnt garlic.
